projects.title: OCR Translator
projects.description: "jpOCR" - A NodeJS application built with Electron which recognizes Japanese text from a user-selected desktop window using an OCR engine and translates it to English through a fetch request to a LibreTranslate server

projects.title: Literary Blog with Management System
projects.description: "Book Sleeper, a poetry blog" - A full-stack MERN website with an on-site Post Management System to handle post creation, modification, and deletion. Its database currently stores more than 100 text documents.
